categories.title: House Information
categories.description: Everything you need to know about your stay

items.title: WiFi Information
items.description: Stay connected during your visit! The WiFi network covers the entire property including the patio and deck areas.
items.tips: For the best signal strength, connect near the living room router.

items.title: Emergency Contacts
items.description: Keep these numbers handy in case of emergency.
items.tips: Save the property manager number to your phone.

items.title: Check-in & Check-out
items.description: Please review our check-in and check-out procedures to ensure a smooth stay.

details.keyLocation: Lockbox on front door - code sent via email

items.tips: Please start laundry before leaving - no need to fold!

items.title: House Rules
items.description: A few simple rules to ensure everyone has a great experience.

items.title: The Spotted Pig BBQ
items.description: A local favorite offering authentic Southern barbecue with a variety of smoked meats and classic sides. Known for generous portions and friendly service.

items.title: Taco'n Madre Grill
items.description: Authentic Mexican restaurant serving fresh tacos, burritos, and traditional favorites. Great atmosphere and friendly staff.

items.title: The Overlook at Chickasaw Point
items.description: Upscale dining at Chickasaw Point featuring American cuisine with beautiful views of Lake Hartwell. Perfect for special occasions.

items.title: Peace of Pie on Hartwell
items.shortDescription: Pizza and subs with lake vibes
items.description: Cozy pizzeria offering a variety of pizzas, subs, and salads. Known for their creative pizza combinations and relaxed lakeside atmosphere.

items.title: Tilly's Tiki Bar and Grill
items.description: Fun tiki-themed bar and grill right on Lake Hartwell. Great burgers, seafood, and tropical drinks. Features a boat dock for easy water access.
items.tips: Quicker to take the boat than the car! Dock your boat and walk right up.

items.title: Chickasaw Point Golf Course
items.description: Beautiful 18-hole golf course in the Chickasaw Point community featuring stunning lake views and challenging play for all skill levels.
items.tips: Book tee times in advance, especially on weekends.

items.title: Tallulah Gorge State Park
items.description: One of the most spectacular canyons in the eastern U.S. Features a 2-mile long, 1,000-foot deep gorge with several waterfalls. Hiking trails range from easy rim walks to challenging gorge floor access.
items.address: 338 Jane Hurt Yarn Road, Tallulah Falls, GA 30573
items.tips: Get a free gorge floor permit early - they're limited to 100 per day. The suspension bridge offers amazing views!

items.title: Lake Hartwell State Park
items.description: Beautiful state park on the shores of Lake Hartwell offering camping, fishing, boating, and swimming. Perfect for a day trip or overnight adventure.
items.address: 19138-A SC Hwy 11 S, Fair Play, SC 29643
items.tips: Rent a kayak or paddleboard from the park office. Sunset views are incredible!

items.title: Lake Hartwell Wildlife Safari
items.description: Exciting drive-through safari experience where you can see and feed exotic animals from your car. Great for families with kids of all ages.
items.tips: Bring extra change for animal feed. Early morning visits are less crowded.

items.title: St. Mary's Sacred Heart Hospital
items.description: Full-service hospital with 24/7 emergency room. Part of the St. Mary's Health Care System providing comprehensive medical services.
items.tips: Take GA-17 South - it's the fastest route from the house.
